page.title: 20BAPTIST CHURCH-CONTRIBUTORS
page.content:
{KEISS BAPTIST CHURCH}This is notable for being the first Baptist Church in Scotland, founded Sir Willaim Sinclair in 1750. The present building dates from 1856. Due to falling numbers this Church has been linked with a Wick charge.
{CONTRIBUTORS} These children were involved in gathering information for the Project:
Yvonne Henderson, Michelle Matheson, Leila Merry, Maree Mowat, Kerry Steven Elaine Sutherland,Angela Polson, Karen Scott,Pamela Begg,Catherine Mackay Gillian Spence,Allan Crowe,Keith Dunnet,Kevin Harrold,Magnus Bain,Bobby Begg,Jason Hamilton,Ralph Merry, Eoin Nethercott,Bruce Richard,Gordon Smith,Brian Alexander,Simopn Begg,Ian Harrold,Ian Polson, Christopher Ward.
